item.description: Night #1 Battle of the Country Bands Friday, March 18 at 7:00pm at Midnight Rodeo Bar, Manchester, NH Country Music Fans WANTED !! Midnight Rodeo Bar and Extreme Country Stampede present night #1 of the Battle of... the Country Bands. We need your vote to help advance the Country Band that you think deserves to play in the finale on April 8th. 4 bands to play each night !! March 18th Line-up Fried Cactus Dan Morgan Whiskey Kill Country Mile DANCING / DOOR PRIZES / GIVEAWAYS / 50/50 RAFFLES LINE DANCE COMPETITION Fun ! Fun ! Fun ! Also joining us each week will be: NHCMA (NH Country Music Association) http://www.nhcma.com/index.html UpReach Therapeutic Riding Center http://www.upreachtrc.org/ The winner of the Battle gets a 1 Year Artist Development Deal with A1 Entertainment and CrossRoads Touring, will perform on stage with Nashville performers Saturday, June 25th in Hopkington, NH where they will also be presented with "Battle of the Band Champion" hand made belt buckles. You don't want to miss out on this event !! See you at Midnight.............Rodeo Bar www.midnightrodeobar.com
item.why: Good exercise.....fun to be with friends...
item.name: Battle of the Bands
